text:
<@U07CEFMGKHU> -  I'm very curious to learn more about what you are doing.

It seems like you are trying to combine two different features.

-React front-end
-UI extensions
CRM cards, to my knowledge are part of the UI Extensions beta and work when viewing an object record from within the CRM

Develop a custom application for HubSpot that integrates both a main interface and UI extensions which connect to HubSpot’s APIs and functionalities.


It's possible you might be over engineering for your use case.

"Develop a custom application for HubSpot that integrates both a main interface and UI extensions which connect to HubSpot’s APIs and functionalities."

You don't need a custom application....you just need a UI extension for the above
